fields.name: Dry Martini
fields.instructions:
- 0.5 oz. dry vermouth
- 2~ dashes of Orange bitters
- 3 oz. gin
- 1 green olive

fields.name: Manhattan
fields.instructions:
- 2 oz. Rittenhouse whiskey
- 1 oz. sweet vermouth
- 2~ dashes of Angustora bitters
- 1~ dashes of Orange bitters
- 1 maraschino cherry

fields.name: Margarita
fields.instructions:
- 1.5 oz. silver tequila
- 0.75 oz. lime juice
- 0.75 oz. Cointreau triple sec
- Optional sugar/nectar
- 1 lime wheel and coarse salt

fields.name: Bloody Mary
fields.instructions:
- 2 oz. vodka
- 0.75 oz. lemon juice
- 3~ dashes of Worchestire sauce
- 3~ dashes of Tabasco
- 1 tsp. of salt, and fresh pepper
- Add ice and fill with tomato juice
- Gently roll the drink in a shaker

fields.name: New Fashioned
fields.instructions:
- 1 sugar cube
- 2~ dashes of Angostura Bitters
- 2 oz. bourbon or rye whiskey
- 1 oz. club soda/water
- Ice, cherry and orange

fields.name: Mojito
fields.instructions:
- 3~ mint leaves in glasses
- 0.5 oz. lime juice
- 0.5 oz. simple syrup
- 2 oz. white rum
- 0.5 oz. club soda

fields.name: Gin & Tonic
fields.instructions:
- 3 oz. London dry gin
- 6 oz. tonic water
- 1~ wedge of lime

fields.name: Pina Colada
fields.instructions:
- 2.5 oz. light rum
- 3 oz. pineapple juice
- 1 oz. coconut cream
- Blend with ice
- Garnish with pineapple

fields.name: Mai Tai
fields.instructions:
- 2 oz. dark rum
- 1 oz. lime juice
- 0.5 oz. orgeat syrup
- 0.5 oz. Cointreau triple sec
- Garnish with mints
- Cherry and pineapple (optional)

fields.name: Old Fashioned
fields.instructions:
- 1 sugar cube
- 1 splash of club soda/water
- 2~ dashes of Angostura bitters
- 2 oz. rye whiskey
- On the rocks, orange zest

fields.name: Negroni
fields.instructions:
- 1 oz. gin
- 1 oz. sweet vermouth
- 1 oz. Campari
- Flame orange zest

fields.name: Daiquiri
fields.instructions:
- 2 oz. white rum
- 0.5 oz lime juice
- 0.5 tsp. fine sugar
- 1 lime wheel

fields.name: Whiskey Sour
fields.instructions:
- 1 egg white
- 1.5 oz. bourbon
- 0.75 oz. lemon juice
- 0.5 oz. simpe syrup
- Dry shake and with ice

fields.name: Moscow Mule
fields.instructions:
- 1 copper mug
- 2 oz. vodka
- 4 oz. ginger beer
- 1 wedge of lime

fields.name: Aviation
fields.instructions:
- 2 oz. Plymouth gin
- 0.5 oz. maraschino liqueur
- 0.5 oz. lemon juice
- 1 tsp. Crème de Violette
- 1 maraschino cherry

fields.name: Mint Julep
fields.instructions:
- 1 julep cup
- 8~ mint leaves bottom of glass
- 1 oz. simple syrup
- 2 oz. bourbon
- Finely crushed in between
- Garnish with mint leaves

fields.name: Clover Club
fields.instructions:
- 1 egg white into mixing glass
- 1.5 oz. of dry gin
- 0.75 oz. lemon Juice
- 0.5 oz. raspberry syrup
- 0.5 oz. simple syrup
- 1 raspberry garnish
- Dry shake and with ice

fields.name: Dark N' Stormy
fields.instructions:
- 2 oz. Goslings Black Seal rum
- 3 oz. Barritts ginger beer
- 0.5 oz. lime juice
-1 lime wedge over top

fields.name: Cosmopolitan
fields.instructions:
- 2 oz. citrus vodka
- 1 oz. Cointreau triple sec
- 1 oz. cranberry juice
- 0.5 oz. lime juice
- Garnish with orange zest

fields.name: Pisco Sour
fields.instructions:
- 1 egg white into mixing glass
- 1.5 oz.  of Pisco
- 1 oz. simple syrup
- 0.75 oz. lemon juice
- Dry shake and with ice
- Garnish with lime wheels

fields.name: Tom Collins
fields.instructions:
- 1.5 oz. of Old Tom Gin
- 0.75 oz. lemon juice
- 0.75 oz. simple syrup
- 1 oz. club soda
- Garnish with orange wheel
